subject: Drunken and Reckless Driving
lead_paragraph: The former major leaguer Jim Leyritz was arrested and jailed after a judge revoked his bond for violating his pretrial release on a manslaughter charge stemming from a 2007 drunken driving accident. The authorities said that Leyritz, 45, had violated the terms of his release by drinking alcohol before his trial.
